titleStmt.title: Bethel, or, A forme for families in which all sorts of both sexes, are soe squarde and framde [sic] by the word, as they may best serue in theire seuerall places, for usefull peices in Gods buildinge / by Mathew Griffith.
titleStmt.author: Griffith, Matthew, 1599?-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ro. Allott and Hen. Taunton, and are to be sold at their shops at ye Black Beare in Paules Churchyard & in St. Dunstons Churchyard Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: lacks all but engraved t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: their shops at ye Black Beare in Paules Churchyard & in St. Dunstons Churchyard Fleetstreete
